00222 void MainWindow::FinishManipulation( )
00223 {
00224         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
00225         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex)->GetNode() );
00226 
00227         SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", true ) );
00228 
00229         QUndoCommand* command = new QUndoCommand();
00230 
00231         QString translationValue = QString( "%1 %2 %3" ).arg( QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[0] ),
00232                                                                                                                 QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[1] ),
00233                                                                                                                 QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[2] ) );
00234         new CmdModifyParameter( nodeTransform, QString( "translation" ), translationValue, m_sceneModel, command );
00235         m_commandStack->push( command );
00236 
00237         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00238         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00239 
00240 }

00245 void MainWindow::StartManipulation( SoDragger* dragger )
00246 {
00247         SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00248         coinSearch->setNode( dragger );
00249         coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST);
00250 
00251         coinSearch->apply( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode() );
00252 
00253         SoPath* coinScenePath = coinSearch->getPath( );
00254         if( !coinScenePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null coinScenePath." );
00255 
00256         SoNodeKitPath* nodePath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* > ( coinScenePath );
00257         if( !nodePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null nodePath." );
00258 
00259 
00260         nodePath->truncate(nodePath->getLength()-1 );
00261         SoBaseKit* coinNode =  static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( nodePath->getTail() );
00262 
00263         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromPath( *nodePath );
00264         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00265 
00266         SoNode* manipulator = coinNode->getPart( "transform", true );
00267         m_manipulators_Buffer = new QStringList();
00268 
00269         SoFieldList fieldList;
00270     int totalFields = manipulator->getFields( fieldList );
00271 
00272     SoField* pField = 0;
00273     SbName fieldName;
00274     SbString fieldValue = "null";
00275 
00276 
00277         for( int index = 0; index < totalFields; ++index )
00278         {
00279                 pField = fieldList.get( index );
00280                 if( pField )
00281                 {
00282 
00283                 pField->get( fieldValue );
00284                         m_manipulators_Buffer->push_back(QString( fieldValue.getString() ) );
00285                 }
00286         }
00287         delete coinSearch;
00288 }

00293 void MainWindow::CalculateSunPosition()

00295 #ifndef NO_MARBLE

00301         connect( &sunposDialog, SIGNAL( changeSunLight( double, double ) ) , this, SLOT( ChangeSunPosition( double, double ) ) );
00302 
00303         sunposDialog.exec();
00304 #endif /* NO_MARBLE*/

00311 void MainWindow::DefineSunLight()
00312 {
00313         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00314         if( !coinScene ) return;
00315 
00316         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
00317         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = sceneInstance->children[ sceneInstance->children.size() -1 ];
00318         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00319 
00320         TLightKit* currentLight = 0;
00321         if( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )       currentLight = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00322 
00323         QVector< TShapeFactory* > shapeFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetShapeFactories();
00324 
00325         QVector< TShapeFactory* > tFlatShapeFactoryList;
00326         for( int i = 0; i < shapeFactoryList.size(); ++i  )
00327                 if( shapeFactoryList[i]->IsFlat() )     tFlatShapeFactoryList<<shapeFactoryList[i];
00328 
00329         QVector< TSunShapeFactory* > tSunShapeFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetSunShapeFactories();
00330 
00331         LightDialog dialog( currentLight, tSunShapeFactoryList );
00332         if( dialog.exec() )
00333         {
00334 
00335                 TLightKit* lightKit = dialog.GetTLightKit();
00336                 if( !lightKit ) return;
00337 
00338                 lightKit->setName( "Light" );
00339 
00340                 CmdLightKitModified* command = new CmdLightKitModified( lightKit, coinScene, *m_sceneModel );
00341                 m_commandStack->push( command );
00342 
00343                 //UpdateLightDimensions();
00344                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00345 
00346                 parametersView->UpdateView();
00347                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00348 
00349                 actionCalculateSunPosition->setEnabled( true );
00350 
00351         }
00352 }

00376 void MainWindow::ExportPhotonMap()
00377 {
00378         if ( m_photonMap == NULL )
00379         {
00380                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh", "No Photon Map stored", 1 );
00381             return;
00382         }
00383 
00384         ExportDialog exportDialog( *m_sceneModel, m_lastExportSurfaceUrl, m_lastExportInGlobal, m_lastExportFileName, this );
00385         if( !exportDialog.exec() ) return;
00386 
00387         QString fileName = exportDialog.GetExportFileName();
00388         if( fileName.isEmpty() )
00389         {
00390                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh", "No file defined to save Photon Map", 1 );
00391                 return;
00392         }
00393         m_lastExportFileName = fileName;
00394         m_lastExportInGlobal = exportDialog.ExportPhotonsInGlobal();
00395 
00396         //Compute photon power
00397         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00398         if( !coinScene ) return;
00399         if( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) ) return;
00400         TLightKit*lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00401 
00402 
00403         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return;
00404         TSunShape* sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
00405         double irradiance = sunShape->GetIrradiance();
00406 
00407         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return;
00408         TLightShape* raycastingShape = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
00409         double inputAperture = raycastingShape->GetArea();
00410 
00411         double wPhoton = ( inputAperture * irradiance ) / m_tracedRays;
00412 
00413         int okExport;
00414         if( exportDialog.ExportAllPhotonMap() )
00415                 okExport = trf::ExportAll( m_lastExportFileName, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00416         else
00417         {
00418                 QString nodeURL = exportDialog.GetSelectedSurface();
00419                 if( !nodeURL.isEmpty() )        m_lastExportSurfaceUrl = nodeURL;
00420 
00421                 QModelIndex selectedNodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeURL );
00422                 InstanceNode* selectedSurface = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( selectedNodeIndex );
00423                 if( !selectedSurface )
00424                 {
00425                         QMessageBox::warning( this, "Tonatiuh", "Selected node in not a valid export node." );
00426                         return;
00427                 }
00428 
00429                 if( m_lastExportInGlobal )
00430                         okExport = trf::ExportSurfaceGlobalCoordinates( m_lastExportFileName, selectedSurface, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00431                 else
00432                         okExport = trf::ExportSurfaceLocalCoordinates( m_lastExportFileName, selectedSurface, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00433         }
00434         if( !okExport )
00435         {
00436                 QMessageBox::warning( this, "Tonatiuh", "An unexpected error has occurred exporting photon map to a file." );
00437                 return;
00438         }
00439 
00440 }

00445 void MainWindow::Open()
00446 {
00447     if ( OkToContinue() )
00448     {
00449         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
00450         QString openDirectory = settings.value( "openDirectory", QString( "." ) ).toString();
00451 
00452         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
00453                                tr( "Open" ), openDirectory,
00454                                tr( "Tonatiuh files (*.tnh)" ) );
00455 
00456         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return;
00457 
00458         QFileInfo file( fileName );
00459         settings.setValue( "openDirectory", file.absolutePath() );
00460         StartOver( fileName );
00461     }
00462 }

00526 void MainWindow::ShowMenu( const QModelIndex& index)
00527 {
00528         if( !index.isValid() ) return;
00529         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( index, QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00530 
00531         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(index);
00532         SoNode* coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
00533         SoType type = coinNode->getTypeId();
00534 
00535         QMenu popupmenu(this);
00536 
00537         if(instanceNode->GetParent()&&instanceNode->GetParent()->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00538         {
00539                 popupmenu.addAction( actionCut );
00540                 popupmenu.addAction( actionCopy );
00541                 popupmenu.addAction( actionPasteCopy );
00542                 popupmenu.addAction( actionPasteLink );
00543                 popupmenu.addAction( actionDelete );
00544         }
00545 
00546         if( type.isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) && !(type.isDerivedFrom( TAnalyzerKit::getClassTypeId() )))
00547         {
00548                 QMenu * trackersMenu = popupmenu.addMenu("Trackers" );
00549                 trackersMenu->addAction( actionSetAimingPointRelative);
00550                 trackersMenu->addAction( actionSetAimingPointAbsolute);
00551 
00552                 QMenu * transformMenu = popupmenu.addMenu("Convert to" );
00553                 //QMenu transformMenu( "Convert to", &popupmenu );
00554                 //popupmenu.addAction( transformMenu.menuAction() );
00555                 TSeparatorKit* coinKit = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* > ( coinNode );
00556                 SoTransform* transform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinKit->getPart("transform", true) );
00557                 SoType transformType = transform->getTypeId();
00558 
00559 
00560                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoCenterballManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoCenterballManip"),  this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoCenterballManip()));
00561                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoHandleBoxManip::getClassTypeId()) )  transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoHandleBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoHandleBoxManip()));
00562                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoJackManip::getClassTypeId()) )       transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoJackManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoJackManip()));
00563                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTabBoxManip::getClassTypeId()) )     transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTabBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTabBoxManip()));
00564                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTrackballManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTrackballManip"),  this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTrackballManip()));
00565                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTransformBoxManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTransformBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTransformBoxManip()));
00566                 if (!transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTransformerManip::getClassTypeId()) ) transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTransformerManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTransformerManip()));
00567 
00568 
00569 
00570                 if ( transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTransformManip::getClassTypeId()) )  transformMenu->addAction( tr("SoTransform"), this, SLOT(SoManip_to_SoTransform()) );
00571 
00572         }
00573 
00574         //Mostramos el menu contextual
00575         popupmenu.exec( QCursor::pos() );
00576 
00577 }
00578 
00582 void MainWindow::ShowRayTracerOptionsDialog()
00583 {
00584         double oldSelectedRandomDeviate = m_selectedRandomDeviate;
00585         QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > randomDeviateFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetRandomDeviateFactories();
00586         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
00587 
00588         RayTraceDialog* options = new RayTraceDialog( m_raysPerIteration, randomDeviateFactoryList, m_fraction, m_drawPhotons, photonmapFactoryList, m_selectedRandomDeviate, m_selectedPhotonMap, m_increasePhotonMap, this );
00589         options->exec();
00590 
00591         SetRaysPerIteration( options->GetNumRays() );
00592         m_selectedRandomDeviate = options->GetRandomDeviateFactoryIndex();
00593         if( oldSelectedRandomDeviate != m_selectedRandomDeviate )
00594         {
00595                 delete m_rand;
00596                 m_rand = 0;
00597         }
00598 
00599         m_fraction = options->GetRaysFactionToDraw();
00600         m_drawPhotons = options->DrawPhotons();
00601 
00602         m_selectedPhotonMap =options->GetPhotonMapFactoryIndex();
00603         m_increasePhotonMap = options->IncreasePhotonMap();
00604 
00605 }

00630 void MainWindow::on_actionEdit_Mode_toggled()
00631 {
00632         if ( !actionEdit_Mode->isChecked() )
00633         {
00634                 m_graphicView[1]->hide();
00635                 m_graphicView[2]->hide();
00636                 m_graphicView[3]->hide();
00637                 m_focusView = 0;
00638         }
00639         else
00640         {
00641                 m_graphicView[1]->show();
00642                 m_graphicView[2]->show();
00643                 m_graphicView[3]->show();
00644         }
00645 }
00646 
00647 void MainWindow::on_actionSunPlane_triggered()
00648 {
00649 
00650         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00651         if ( !coinScene )  return;
00652 
00653         //Check if there is a light and is properly configured
00654         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )     return;
00655         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00656         if ( !lightKit ) return;
00657 
00658 
00659         SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00660         coinSearch->setNode( lightKit );
00661         coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST );
00662         coinSearch->apply( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode() );
00663 
00664         SoPath* lightPath = coinSearch->getPath( );
00665         if( !lightPath ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow Null light path." );
00666 
00667         const SbViewportRegion vpr = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetViewportRegion();
00668         SoGetMatrixAction * getmatrixaction = new SoGetMatrixAction(vpr);
00669         getmatrixaction->apply( lightPath );
00670 
00671         Transform  lightToWorld = tgf::TransformFromMatrix( getmatrixaction->getMatrix() );
00672 
00673         //Vector3D camOrientation= lightToWorld( Vector3D( 0.0, -1.0, 0.0 ) );
00674 
00675         //double t = 1.0;
00676         //if( camPosition.y != 0.0 && camOrientation.y != 0.0 ) t = -camPosition.y / camOrientation.y;
00677         //Point3D targetPoint = camPosition + camOrientation * t;
00678 
00679 
00680         SoCamera* cam = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetCamera();
00681         Point3D camPosition = lightToWorld( Point3D( 0.0, cam->focalDistance.getValue(), 0.0 ) );
00682 
00683 
00684         SbVec3f target = getTargetOfCamera(cam);
00685 
00686         cam->position.setValue( target + SbVec3f( camPosition.x, camPosition.y, camPosition.z ) );
00687         cam->pointAt( target );
00688         //cam->viewAll( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode(), vpr );
00689 }
00690 
00691 SbVec3f MainWindow::getTargetOfCamera(SoCamera* cam)
00692 {
00693         SbVec3f axis;
00694         float angle;
00695         cam->orientation.getValue(axis,angle);
00696         SbRotation * rotation  = new SbRotation (axis,angle);
00697         SbVec3f center;
00698         rotation->multVec(SbVec3f (0, 0, -cam->focalDistance.getValue()), center);
00699         center += cam->position.getValue();
00700         return center;
00701 }

00771 void MainWindow::ChangeGridSettings()
00772 {
00773         GridSettingsDialog gridDialog( m_gridXElements, m_gridZElements, m_gridXSpacing, m_gridZSpacing );
00774         if( gridDialog.exec() )
00775         {
00776                 m_graphicsRoot->RemoveGrid();
00777 
00778                 m_gridXElements = gridDialog.GetXDimension();
00779                 m_gridZElements = gridDialog.GetZDimension();
00780 
00781                 if( gridDialog.IsSizeDefined() )
00782                 {
00783                         m_gridXSpacing = gridDialog.GetXSpacing();
00784                         m_gridZSpacing = gridDialog.GetZSpacing();
00785                 }
00786                 else
00787                 {
00788 
00789                         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
00790                         if ( !sceneInstance )  return;
00791                         SoNode* rootNode = sceneInstance->GetNode();
00792                         SoPath* nodePath = new SoPath( rootNode );
00793                         nodePath->ref();
00794 
00795                         SbViewportRegion region = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetViewportRegion();
00796                         SoGetBoundingBoxAction* bbAction = new SoGetBoundingBoxAction( region ) ;
00797                         if(nodePath)    bbAction->apply(nodePath);
00798 
00799                         SbXfBox3f box= bbAction->getXfBoundingBox();
00800                         delete bbAction;
00801                         nodePath->unref();
00802 
00803                         m_gridXSpacing = 10;
00804                         m_gridZSpacing = 10;
00805 
00806                         if( !box.isEmpty() )
00807                         {
00808                                 SbVec3f min, max;
00809                                 box.getBounds(min, max);
00810 
00811                                 m_gridXSpacing = ( 2 *  std::max( fabs( max[0] ), fabs( min[0] ) ) + 5  ) / m_gridXElements;
00812                                 m_gridZSpacing = ( 2 *  std::max( fabs( max[2] ), fabs( min[2] ) ) + 5 ) / m_gridZElements;
00813 
00814                         }
00815 
00816                 }
00817                 m_graphicsRoot->AddGrid( CreateGrid( m_gridXElements, m_gridZElements, m_gridXSpacing, m_gridZSpacing ) );
00818                 m_graphicsRoot->ShowGrid( true );
00819         }
00820 
00821 }

00884 void MainWindow::CreateGroupNode()
00885 {
00886         QModelIndex parentIndex;
00887         if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex()))
00888                 parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
00889         else
00890                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
00891 
00892         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
00893         if( !parentInstance ) return;
00894 
00895         SoNode* coinNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
00896         if( !coinNode ) return;
00897 
00898         if ( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TAnalyzerKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
00899 
00900         if ( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00901         {
00902                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = new TSeparatorKit();
00903 
00904                 CmdInsertSeparatorKit* cmdInsertSeparatorKit = new CmdInsertSeparatorKit( separatorKit, QPersistentModelIndex(parentIndex), m_sceneModel );
00905                 cmdInsertSeparatorKit->setText( "Insert SeparatorKit node" );
00906                 m_commandStack->push( cmdInsertSeparatorKit );
00907 
00908                 int count = 1;
00909                 QString nodeName = QString( "TSeparatorKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
00910                 while ( !m_sceneModel->SetNodeName( separatorKit, nodeName ) )
00911                 {
00912                         count++;
00913                         nodeName = QString( "TSeparatorKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
00914                 }
00915                 
00916                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00917                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00918 
00919         }
00920 }

00938

00940         {

00951                 QString nodeName = QString( "TAnalyzerKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
00952                 while ( !m_sceneModel->SetNodeName( analyzerKit, nodeName ) )
00953                 {
00954                         count++;
00955                         nodeName = QString( "TAnalyzerKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
00956                 }
00957                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00958                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00959         }

00966 void MainWindow::CreateMaterial( QString materialType )
00967 {
00968         QVector< TMaterialFactory* > factoryList = m_pluginManager->GetMaterialFactories();
00969         if( factoryList.size() == 0 )   return;
00970 
00971         QVector< QString > materialNames;
00972         for( int i = 0; i < factoryList.size(); i++ )
00973                 materialNames<< factoryList[i]->TMaterialName();
00974 
00975         int selectedMaterial = materialNames.indexOf( materialType );
00976         if( selectedMaterial < 0 )      return;
00977 
00978         CreateMaterial( factoryList[ selectedMaterial ] );
00979 }

01099 void MainWindow::Delete( )
01100 {
01101         if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() ) return;
01102         QModelIndex selection = m_selectionModel->currentIndex();
01103         m_selectionModel->clearSelection();
01104 
01105         InstanceNode* selectionNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( selection );
01106         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( selectionNode->GetParent()->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01107 
01108         Delete( selection );
01109 }

01164 void MainWindow::InsertFileComponent( QString componentFileName )
01165 {
01166         QModelIndex parentIndex;
01167         if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) )
01168                         parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
01169         else
01170                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01171 
01172         SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex )->GetNode();
01173         if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01174 
01175         if ( componentFileName.isEmpty() ) return;
01176 
01177         SoInput componentInput;
01178         if ( !componentInput.openFile( componentFileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
01179         {
01180                 QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Scene Graph Structure" ),
01181                                 tr( "Cannot open file:\n%1." ).arg( componentFileName ) );
01182                 return;
01183         }
01184 
01185         SoSeparator* componentSeparator = SoDB::readAll( &componentInput );
01186         componentInput.closeFile();
01187 
01188         if ( !componentSeparator )
01189         {
01190                 QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Scene Graph Structure" ),
01191                                 tr( "Error reading file: \n%1." )
01192                                 .arg( componentFileName ) );
01193                 return;
01194         }
01195 
01196         TSeparatorKit* componentRoot = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( componentSeparator->getChild(0) );
01197         CmdInsertSeparatorKit* cmdInsertSeparatorKit = new CmdInsertSeparatorKit( componentRoot, QPersistentModelIndex(parentIndex), m_sceneModel );
01198         cmdInsertSeparatorKit->setText( "Insert SeparatorKit node" );
01199         m_commandStack->push( cmdInsertSeparatorKit );
01200 
01201         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01202         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01203 
01204 }
01205 
01211 void MainWindow::InsertUserDefinedComponent()
01212 {
01213         QModelIndex parentIndex;
01214          if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) )
01215                  parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
01216          else
01217                  parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01218 
01219         SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex )->GetNode();
01220 
01221         if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01222 
01223         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
01224                                                        tr( "Open Tonatiuh document" ), ".",
01225                                                        tr( "Tonatiuh component (*.tcmp)" ) );
01226 
01227         if ( fileName.isEmpty() ) return;
01228 
01229         InsertFileComponent( fileName );
01230 }

01287 
01291 void MainWindow::Run()
01292 {
01293         QDateTime startTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01294 
01295     // Initialize variables
01296         InstanceNode* rootSeparatorInstance = 0;
01297         InstanceNode* lightInstance = 0;
01298         SoTransform* lightTransform = 0;
01299         TSunShape* sunShape = 0;
01300         TLightShape* raycastingSurface = 0;
01301 
01302         if( ReadyForRaytracing( rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, lightTransform, sunShape, raycastingSurface ) )
01303         {
01304                 m_sceneModel->PrepareAnalyze();
01305                 QVector< QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform > > surfacesList;
01306 
01307 
01308                 //Compute bounding boxes and world to object transforms
01309                 trf::ComputeSceneTreeMap( rootSeparatorInstance, Transform( new Matrix4x4 ), &surfacesList,true );
01310 
01311                 TLightKit* light = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( lightInstance->GetNode() );
01312                 light->ComputeLightSourceArea( surfacesList );
01313 
01314                 QVector< double > raysPerThread;
01315                 const int maximumValueProgressScale = 100;
01316                 unsigned long  t1 = m_raysPerIteration / maximumValueProgressScale;
01317                 for( int progressCount = 0; progressCount < maximumValueProgressScale; ++ progressCount )
01318                         raysPerThread<< t1;
01319 
01320                 if( ( t1 * maximumValueProgressScale ) < m_raysPerIteration )   raysPerThread<< ( m_raysPerIteration-( t1* maximumValueProgressScale) );
01321 
01322                 Transform lightToWorld = tgf::TransformFromSoTransform( lightTransform );
01323 
01324                 // Create a progress dialog.
01325                 QProgressDialog dialog;
01326                 dialog.setLabelText(QString("Progressing using %1 thread(s)...").arg(QThread::idealThreadCount()));
01327 
01328                 //ParallelRandomDeviate* m_pParallelRand = new ParallelRandomDeviate( *m_rand,140000 );
01329                 // Create a QFutureWatcher and conncect signals and slots.
01330                 QFutureWatcher< TPhotonMap* > futureWatcher;
01331                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(finished()), &dialog, SLOT(reset()));
01332                 QObject::connect(&dialog, SIGNAL(canceled()), &futureWatcher, SLOT(cancel()));
01333                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(progressRangeChanged(int, int)), &dialog, SLOT(setRange(int, int)));
01334                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(progressValueChanged(int)), &dialog, SLOT(setValue(int)));
01335 
01336                 QMutex mutex;
01337                 QFuture< TPhotonMap* > photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerThread, RayTracer(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, *m_rand, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
01338                 futureWatcher.setFuture( photonMap );
01339 
01340                 // Display the dialog and start the event loop.
01341                 dialog.exec();
01342                 futureWatcher.waitForFinished();
01343 
01344 
01345                 QDateTime time2 = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01346                 std::cout <<"time2: "<< startTime.secsTo( time2 ) << std::endl;
01347 
01348                 m_tracedRays += m_raysPerIteration;
01349 
01350                 SoSFVec3f scaleVect = lightTransform->scaleFactor;
01351                 float scalex,scaley,scalez;
01352                 scaleVect.getValue().getValue(scalex,scaley,scalez);
01353                 m_sceneModel->FinalyzeAnalyze(double(m_raysPerIteration)/(raycastingSurface->GetArea()*scalex*scalez));
01354 
01355 
01356                 ShowRaysIn3DView();
01357 
01358         }
01359 
01360         QDateTime endTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01361         std::cout <<"Elapsed time: "<< startTime.secsTo( endTime ) << std::endl;
01362 }
01363 
01364 
01365 void MainWindow::ResetAnalyzerValues()
01366 {
01367         m_sceneModel->ResetAnalyzeValues();
01368 }

01370 
01378 bool MainWindow::Save()
01379 {
01380         if ( m_currentFile.isEmpty() ) return SaveAs();
01381         else return SaveFile( m_currentFile );
01382 }
01383 
01389 bool MainWindow::SaveAs()
01390 {
01391 
01392         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
01393 
01394         QString saveDirectory = settings.value( "saveDirectory", QString( "." ) ).toString();
01395 
01396         QString tonatiuhFilter( "Tonatiuh files (*.tnh)" );
01397         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
01398                                tr( "Save" ), saveDirectory,
01399                                tonatiuhFilter, &tonatiuhFilter );
01400         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return false;
01401 
01402         QFileInfo file( fileName );
01403         settings.setValue( "saveDirectory", file.absolutePath() );
01404 
01405         if( file.completeSuffix().compare( "tnh" ) )
01406                 fileName.append( ".tnh" );
01407         return SaveFile( fileName );
01408 }
01409 
01414 void MainWindow::SelectNode( QString nodeUrl )
01415 {
01416         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeUrl );
01417         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01418 }
01419 
01424 bool MainWindow::SaveComponent()
01425 {
01426     if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() ) return false;
01427     if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
01428 
01429     QModelIndex componentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01430 
01431     SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( componentIndex )->GetNode();
01432 
01433     if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01434     {
01435         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
01436                                   tr( "Selected node in not valid  for component node" ) );
01437         return false;
01438     }
01439 
01440     TSeparatorKit* componentRoot = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* > ( coinNode );
01441     if( !componentRoot ) return false;
01442 
01443 
01444         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
01445                                tr( "Save Tonatiuh component" ), ".",
01446                                tr( "Tonatiuh component (*.tcmp)" ) );
01447         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return false;
01448 
01449         QFileInfo componentFile( fileName );
01450         if( componentFile.completeSuffix().compare( "tcmp" ) )
01451                 fileName.append( ".tcmp" );
01452 
01453     SoWriteAction SceneOuput;
01454     if ( !SceneOuput.getOutput()->openFile( fileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
01455         {
01456         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
01457                               tr( "Cannot open file %1. " )
01458                             .arg( fileName ));
01459                 return false;
01460         }
01461 
01462     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
01463         SceneOuput.getOutput()->setBinary( false );
01464         SceneOuput.apply( componentRoot );
01465         SceneOuput.getOutput()->closeFile();
01466         QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
01467         return true;
01468 }
01469 
01473 void MainWindow::SetNodeName( QString nodeName )
01474 {
01475         if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() ) return;
01476         if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return;
01477 
01478         ChangeNodeName( m_selectionModel->currentIndex(), nodeName );
01479 }
01480 
01484 int MainWindow::SetPhotonMapType( QString typeName )
01485 {
01486         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > factoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
01487         if( factoryList.size() == 0 )   return 0;
01488 
01489         QVector< QString > photonMapNames;
01490         for( int i = 0; i < factoryList.size(); i++ )
01491                 photonMapNames<< factoryList[i]->TPhotonMapName();
01492 
01493         m_selectedPhotonMap = photonMapNames.indexOf( typeName );
01494         if( m_selectedPhotonMap < 0 )   return 0;
01495 
01496         return 1;
01497 }
01498 
01502 void MainWindow::SetRaysPerIteration( unsigned long rays )
01503 {
01504         m_raysPerIteration = rays;
01505 }
01506 
01510 void MainWindow::SetValue( QString nodeUrl, QString parameter, QString value )
01511 {
01512         if( nodeUrl.isEmpty() || parameter.isEmpty() || value.isEmpty() )
01513         {
01514                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",
01515             "You must define a node url, a parameter name and a value.", 1 );
01516                 return;
01517         }
01518 
01519         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeUrl );
01520         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() )
01521         {
01522                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",
01523             "Defined node url is not a valid url.", 1 );
01524                 return;
01525         }
01526 
01527         InstanceNode* nodeInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( nodeIndex );
01528         if( !nodeInstance )     return;
01529 
01530         SoNode* node = nodeInstance->GetNode();
01531         if( !node )     return;
01532         if ( node->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01533         {
01534                 TSeparatorKit* separatorNode = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( node );
01535                 SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( separatorNode->getPart( "transform", true ) );
01536                 node = nodeTransform;
01537         }
01538 
01539 
01540         SoField* parameterField = node->getField( parameter.toStdString().c_str() );
01541         if( !parameterField )
01542         {
01543                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",
01544             QString( "Defined node has not contains the parameter %1." ).arg( parameter), 1 );
01545                 return;
01546         }
01547         SetParameterValue( node, parameter, value );
01548 }
01549 
01550 
01551 //Manipulators actions
01552 void MainWindow::SoTransform_to_SoCenterballManip()
01553 {
01554         //Transform to a SoCenterballManip manipulator
01555         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01556 
01557         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex);
01558         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( instanceNode->GetNode() );
01559         SoTransform* transform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", false ) );
01560 
01561         SoCenterballManip * manipulator = new SoCenterballManip;
01562         manipulator->rotation.setValue(transform->rotation.getValue());
01563         manipulator->translation.setValue(transform->translation.getValue());
01564         manipulator->scaleFactor.setValue(transform->scaleFactor.getValue());
01565         manipulator->scaleOrientation.setValue(transform->scaleOrientation.getValue());
01566         manipulator->center.setValue(transform->center.getValue());
01567 
01568         coinNode->setPart("transform", manipulator);
01569         ChangeSelection( currentIndex );
01570 
01571         SoDragger* dragger = manipulator->getDragger();
01572         dragger->addStartCallback (startManipulator, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
01573         dragger->addFinishCallback(finishManipulator, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
01574 
01575         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01576 }
01577

01737 void MainWindow::SoManip_to_SoTransform()
01738 {
01739         //Transform manipulator to a SoTransform
01740         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01741 
01742         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex);
01743         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( instanceNode->GetNode() );
01744         SoTransformManip* manipulator = static_cast< SoTransformManip* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", false ) );
01745         if( !manipulator ) return;
01746 
01747         SoTransform* transform = new SoTransform;
01748         transform->rotation.setValue(manipulator->rotation.getValue());
01749         transform->translation.setValue(manipulator->translation.getValue());
01750         transform->scaleFactor.setValue(manipulator->scaleFactor.getValue());
01751         transform->scaleOrientation.setValue(manipulator->scaleOrientation.getValue());
01752         transform->center.setValue(manipulator->center.getValue());
01753 
01754         coinNode->setPart("transform", transform);
01755         ChangeSelection( currentIndex );
01756 
01757         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01758 }
01759 
01760 //for graphicview signals
01761 void MainWindow::selectionFinish( SoSelection* selection )
01762 {
01763     if(selection->getNumSelected() == 0 ) return;
01764 
01765     SoPath* selectionPath = selection->getPath( 0 );
01766     if ( !selectionPath ) return;
01767 
01768     if ( !selectionPath->containsNode ( m_document->GetSceneKit() ) ) return;
01769 
01770     SoNodeKitPath* nodeKitPath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* >( selectionPath );
01771     if(nodeKitPath->getTail()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(SoDragger::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01772 
01773     QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromPath( *nodeKitPath );
01774         if ( !nodeIndex.isValid() ) return;
01775         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01776         m_selectionModel->select( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01777 
01778 }
01779 
01780 void MainWindow::ChangeSelection( const QModelIndex& current )
01781 {
01782         InstanceNode* instanceSelected = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( current );
01783     SoNode* selectedCoinNode = instanceSelected->GetNode();
01784 
01785     if (selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01786         {
01787                 SoBaseKit* selectedCoinNodeKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( selectedCoinNode );
01788                 parametersView->SelectionChangedToKit( selectedCoinNodeKit);
01789         }
01790         else
01791         {
01792                 parametersView->SelectionChangedToPart(selectedCoinNode);
01793         }
01794 }
01795 
01796 //for sunposdialog signals
01801 void MainWindow::ChangeSunPosition(  double azimuth, double zenith )
01802 {
01803         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
01804         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
01805         if ( !lightKit )
01806         {
01807                 QMessageBox::warning( this, "Toantiuh warning", tr( "Sun not defined in scene" ) );
01808         }
01809         else
01810         {
01811                 CmdLightPositionModified* command = new CmdLightPositionModified( lightKit, azimuth, zenith );
01812                 m_commandStack->push( command );
01813 
01814                 //UpdateLightDimensions();
01815                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01816                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01817         }
01818 }

01820 
01826 void MainWindow::CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* pTMaterialFactory )
01827 {
01828         QModelIndex parentIndex = ( (! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) ) ?
01829                                                                 m_sceneModel->index( 0, 0, sceneModelView->rootIndex( )):
01830                                                                 sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01831 
01832         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
01833         SoNode* parentNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
01834         if( !parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01835 
01836         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
01837         TMaterial* material = static_cast< TMaterial* >( shapeKit->getPart( "material", false ) );
01838 
01839     if ( material )
01840     {
01841         QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh Action",
01842                                   "This TShapeKit already contains a material node", 1);
01843             return;
01844     }
01845 
01846         material = pTMaterialFactory->CreateTMaterial();
01847     QString typeName = pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName();
01848     material->setName( typeName.toStdString().c_str() );
01849 
01850     CmdInsertMaterial* createMaterial = new CmdInsertMaterial( shapeKit, material, m_sceneModel );
01851     QString commandText = QString( "Create Material: %1").arg( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName().toLatin1().constData() );
01852     createMaterial->setText(commandText);
01853     m_commandStack->push( createMaterial );
01854 
01855         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01856     m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01857 }
01858 
01868 void MainWindow::CreateShape( TShapeFactory* pTShapeFactory )
01869 {
01870     QModelIndex parentIndex = ((! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex())) ?
01871                                                                 m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex()) : sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01872 
01873         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
01874         SoNode* parentNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
01875         if( !parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01876 
01877         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
01878         TShape* shape = static_cast< TShape* >( shapeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) );
01879 
01880     if (shape)
01881     {
01882         QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh Action",
01883                                   "This TShapeKit already contains a shape", 1);
01884     }
01885     else
01886     {
01887         shape = pTShapeFactory->CreateTShape();
01888         shape->setName( pTShapeFactory->TShapeName().toStdString().c_str() );
01889         CmdInsertShape* createShape = new CmdInsertShape( shapeKit, shape, m_sceneModel );
01890         QString commandText = QString( "Create Shape: %1" ).arg( pTShapeFactory->TShapeName().toLatin1().constData());
01891         createShape->setText( commandText );
01892         m_commandStack->push( createShape );
01893 
01894         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01895         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01896     }
01897 }
01898 
01899 
01900 void MainWindow::CreateTracker( TTrackerFactory* pTTrackerFactory )
01901 {
01902         QModelIndex parentIndex = ((! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex())) ?
01903                                                                         m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex()):
01904                                                                         sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01905 
01906         TSceneKit* scene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
01907 
01908         TTracker* tracker = pTTrackerFactory->CreateTTracker( );
01909         tracker->SetSceneKit( scene );
01910 
01911         CmdInsertTracker* command = new CmdInsertTracker( tracker, parentIndex, scene, m_sceneModel );
01912         m_commandStack->push( command );
01913 
01914         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01915         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01916 }

01918 
01919 //for treeview signals
01920 void MainWindow::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent * e )
01921 {
01922         QPoint pos = e->pos();
01923         int x = pos.x();
01924         int y = pos.y()-64;
01925 
01926         QSplitter *pSplitter = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicHorizontalSplitter" );
01927         QRect mainViewRect = pSplitter->geometry();
01928 
01929         if( mainViewRect.contains( x, y ) )
01930         {
01931                 QSplitter *pvSplitter1 = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" );
01932                 QSplitter *pvSplitter2 = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" );
01933                 QRect vViewRect1 = pvSplitter1->geometry();
01934                 if(vViewRect1.contains(x,y))
01935                 {
01936                         QList<int> size(pvSplitter2->sizes());
01937                         if(x < size[0])
01938                                 m_focusView = 0;
01939                         if(x > size[0])
01940                                 m_focusView = 1;
01941                 }
01942                 else
01943                 {
01944                         QList<int> size(pvSplitter1->sizes());
01945                         if(x < size[0])
01946                                 m_focusView = 2;
01947                         if(x > size[0])
01948                                 m_focusView = 3;
01949                 }
01950         }
01951 }
01952 
01953 
01954 void MainWindow::itemDragAndDrop( const QModelIndex& newParent,  const QModelIndex& node)
01955 {
01956         if( node == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return;
01957 
01958 
01959         InstanceNode* nodeInstnace = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( node );
01960         if(nodeInstnace->GetParent()&&nodeInstnace->GetParent()->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01961         {
01962                 SoNode* coinNode = nodeInstnace->GetNode();
01963                 //if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01964 
01965                 QUndoCommand* dragAndDrop = new QUndoCommand();
01966                 dragAndDrop->setText("Drag and Drop node");
01967                 new CmdCut( node, m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel, dragAndDrop );
01968 
01969                 new CmdPaste( tgc::Copied, newParent, coinNode, *m_sceneModel, dragAndDrop );
01970                 m_commandStack->push( dragAndDrop );
01971 
01972                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01973                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01974         }
01975 
01976 }
01977 
01978 void MainWindow::itemDragAndDropCopy(const QModelIndex& newParent, const QModelIndex& node)
01979 {
01980         InstanceNode* nodeInstnace = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( node );
01981         SoNode* coinNode = nodeInstnace->GetNode();
01982         //if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01983 
01984         QUndoCommand* dragAndDropCopy = new QUndoCommand();
01985         dragAndDropCopy->setText("Drag and Drop Copy");
01986         new CmdCopy( node, m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel );
01987         new CmdPaste( tgc::Shared, newParent, coinNode, *m_sceneModel, dragAndDropCopy );
01988         m_commandStack->push( dragAndDropCopy );
01989 
01990         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01991         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01992 }

01995 {
01996     if ( OkToContinue() )
01997     {
01998         WriteSettings();
01999         event->accept();
02000     }
02001     else event->ignore();
02002 }
02006 void MainWindow::ChangeModelScene()
02007 {
02008         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02009 
02010         m_sceneModel->SetCoinScene( *coinScene );
02011     m_graphicsRoot->AddModel( coinScene );
02012 
02013         QModelIndex viewRootNodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( QString( "//SunNode" ) );
02014         InstanceNode* viewRootNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( viewRootNodeIndex );
02015         sceneModelView->setRootIndex( viewRootNodeIndex );
02016 
02017         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = viewRootNode->children[ 0 ];
02018 
02019         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
02020 
02021 }
02022 
02026 SoSeparator* MainWindow::CreateGrid( int xDimension, int zDimension, double xSpacing, double zSpacing )
02027 {
02028 
02029         double xWidth = xDimension * xSpacing;
02030         double zWidth = zDimension * zSpacing;
02031 
02032         int nVertex = xDimension * zDimension + 4;
02033     SbVec3f* vertex = new SbVec3f[nVertex];
02034 
02035     int nLines = xDimension + zDimension + 2;
02036     int* lines = new int[nLines];
02037 
02038 
02039     int vNum = 0;
02040     int lNum = 0;
02041     for( int xIndex = 0; xIndex <= xDimension; ++xIndex )
02042         {
02043                 double xValue = -( xWidth / 2  ) + xIndex * xSpacing;
02044                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xValue, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
02045                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xValue, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
02046                 lines[lNum++] = 2;
02047         }
02048 
02049         vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
02050         vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
02051     lines[lNum++] = 2;
02052         vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
02053         vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
02054     lines[lNum++] = 2;
02055 
02056     for( int zIndex = 1; zIndex < zDimension; ++zIndex )
02057         {
02058                 double zValue = -( zWidth / 2  ) + zIndex * zSpacing;
02059                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2 , 0.0, zValue );
02060                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2 , 0.0, zValue );
02061             lines[lNum++] = 2;
02062         }
02063 
02064 
02065         SoSeparator* grid = new SoSeparator;
02066 
02067         SoMaterial* mat = new SoMaterial;
02068         static float colors[2][3] = { {0.4f, 0.4f, 0.4f}, {0.6f, 0.6f, 0.6f} };
02069         mat->diffuseColor.setValues(0, 2, colors);
02070         grid->addChild(mat);
02071 
02072         SoCoordinate3* line_coords = new SoCoordinate3;
02073         line_coords->point.setValues(0, nVertex, vertex);
02074         grid->addChild(line_coords);
02075 
02076         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
02077         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,lNum,lines);
02078         grid->addChild(lineset);
02079 
02080 
02081     delete[] vertex;
02082     delete[] lines;
02083         return grid;
02084 
02085 }

02114 
02120 bool MainWindow::Delete( QModelIndex index )
02121 {
02122 
02123         if( !index.isValid()) return false;
02124         if( index == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
02125         if( index.parent() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
02126 
02127         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( index );
02128         SoNode* coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
02129 
02130         if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
02131         {
02132                 CmdDeleteTracker* commandDelete = new CmdDeleteTracker( index, m_document->GetSceneKit(), *m_sceneModel );
02133                 m_commandStack->push( commandDelete );
02134         }
02135         else
02136         {
02137                 CmdDelete* commandDelete = new CmdDelete( index, *m_sceneModel );
02138                 m_commandStack->push( commandDelete );
02139         }
02140 
02141 
02142         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02143         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02144 
02145         return true;
02146 }
02147 
02151 QSplitter* MainWindow::GetHorizontalSplitterPointer()
02152 {
02153     QSplitter* pSplitter = findChild< QSplitter* >( "horizontalSplitter" );
02154     if( !pSplitter ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::GetSceneModelViewPointer: splitter not found" );
02155     return pSplitter;
02156 }
02157 
02162 bool MainWindow::OkToContinue()
02163 {
02164         if ( m_document->IsModified() )
02165         {
02166                 int answer = QMessageBox::warning( this, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
02167                                  tr( "The document has been modified.\n"
02168                                      "Do you want to save your changes?"),
02169                                  QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::Default,
02170                                  QMessageBox::No,
02171                                  QMessageBox::Cancel | QMessageBox::Escape );
02172 
02173                 if ( answer == QMessageBox::Yes ) return Save();
02174                 else if ( answer == QMessageBox::Cancel ) return false;
02175         }
02176         return true;
02177 }
02178 
02185 bool MainWindow::Paste( QModelIndex nodeIndex, tgc::PasteType type )
02186 {
02187         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() ) return false;
02188         if( !m_coinNode_Buffer ) return false;
02189 
02190         InstanceNode* ancestor = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( nodeIndex );
02191         SoNode* selectedCoinNode = ancestor->GetNode();
02192 
02193         if ( !selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return false;
02194         if ( ( selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) &&
02195         ( m_coinNode_Buffer->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) )       return false;
02196 
02197         if( ancestor->GetNode() == m_coinNode_Buffer)  return false;
02198         while( ancestor->GetParent() )
02199         {
02200                 if(ancestor->GetParent()->GetNode() == m_coinNode_Buffer )      return false;
02201                 ancestor = ancestor->GetParent();
02202         }
02203 
02204         CmdPaste* commandPaste = new CmdPaste( type, m_selectionModel->currentIndex(), m_coinNode_Buffer, *m_sceneModel );
02205         m_commandStack->push( commandPaste );
02206 
02207         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02208         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02209         return true;
02210 
02211 }
02212 
02216 QDir MainWindow::PluginDirectory()
02217 {
02218         // Returns the path to the top level plug-in directory.
02219         // It is assumed that this is a subdirectory named "plugins" of the directory in
02220         // which the running version of Tonatiuh is located.
02221 
02222     QDir directory( qApp->applicationDirPath() );
02223         directory.cd( "plugins" );
02224         return directory;
02225 }
02226 
02230 void MainWindow::ReadSettings()
02231 {
02232     QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
02233     QRect rect = settings.value( "geometry", QRect(200, 200, 400, 400 ) ).toRect();
02234     move( rect.topLeft() );
02235     resize( rect.size() );
02236 
02237     setWindowState( Qt::WindowNoState );
02238     if( settings.value( "windowNoState", false ).toBool() )     setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowNoState );
02239     if( settings.value( "windowMinimized", false ).toBool() )   setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowMinimized );
02240     if( settings.value( "windowMaximized", true ).toBool() )    setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowMaximized );
02241     if( settings.value( "windowFullScreen", false ).toBool() )  setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowFullScreen );
02242     if( settings.value( "windowActive", false ).toBool() )      setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowActive );
02243     m_recentFiles = settings.value( "recentFiles" ).toStringList();
02244     UpdateRecentFileActions();
02245 
02246 }
02247 
02251 bool MainWindow::ReadyForRaytracing( InstanceNode*& rootSeparatorInstance, InstanceNode*& lightInstance, SoTransform*& lightTransform, TSunShape*& sunShape, TLightShape*& raycastingShape )
02252 {
02253 
02254         //Check if there is a scene
02255         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02256         if ( !coinScene )  return false;
02257 
02258         //Check if there is a rootSeparator InstanceNode
02259         rootSeparatorInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
02260         if( !rootSeparatorInstance ) return false;
02261 
02262         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = rootSeparatorInstance->GetParent();
02263         if ( !sceneInstance )  return false;
02264 
02265         //Check if there is a light and is properly configured
02266         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )     return false;
02267         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
02268 
02269         lightInstance = sceneInstance->children[0];
02270         if ( !lightInstance ) return false;
02271 
02272         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return false;
02273         sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
02274 
02275         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return false;
02276         raycastingShape = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
02277 
02278         if( !lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,false ) ) return false;
02279         lightTransform = static_cast< SoTransform * >( lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,false ) );
02280 
02281 
02282         QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > randomDeviateFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetRandomDeviateFactories();
02283         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
02284 
02285         //Check if there is a random generator selected;
02286         if( m_selectedRandomDeviate == -1 )
02287         {
02288                 if( randomDeviateFactoryList.size() > 0 ) m_selectedRandomDeviate = 0;
02289                 else    return false;
02290         }
02291 
02292         //Create the random generator
02293         if( !m_rand )   m_rand =  randomDeviateFactoryList[m_selectedRandomDeviate]->CreateRandomDeviate();
02294 
02295         //Check if there is a photon map type selected;
02296         if( m_selectedPhotonMap == -1 )
02297         {
02298                 if( photonmapFactoryList.size() > 0 ) m_selectedPhotonMap = 0;
02299                 else    return false;
02300         }
02301 
02302         //Create the photon map where photons are going to be stored
02303         if( !m_increasePhotonMap )
02304         {
02305                 delete m_photonMap;
02306                 m_photonMap = 0;
02307         }
02308 
02309         if( !m_photonMap )
02310         {
02311                 QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
02312 
02313                 m_photonMap = photonmapFactoryList[m_selectedPhotonMap]->CreateTPhotonMap();
02314                 m_tracedRays = 0;
02315         }
02316 
02317 
02318         return true;
02319 }
02320 
02326 bool MainWindow::SaveFile( const QString& fileName )
02327 {
02328         if( !m_document->WriteFile( fileName ) )
02329         {
02330                 statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "Saving canceled" ), 2000 );
02331                 return false;
02332         }
02333 
02334         SetCurrentFile( fileName );
02335         statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "File saved" ), 2000 );
02336         return true;
02337 }
02338 
02342 void MainWindow::SetCurrentFile( const QString& fileName )
02343 {
02344         m_currentFile = fileName;
02345         m_document->SetDocumentModified( false );
02346 
02347         QString shownName = "Untitled";
02348         if ( !m_currentFile.isEmpty() )
02349         {
02350                 shownName = StrippedName( m_currentFile );
02351                 m_recentFiles.removeAll( m_currentFile );
02352                 m_recentFiles.prepend( m_currentFile );
02353                 UpdateRecentFileActions();
02354         }
02355 
02356         setWindowTitle( tr( "%1[*] - %2" ).arg( shownName ).arg( tr( "Tonatiuh" ) ) );
02357 }

02362 void MainWindow::SetupActions()
02363 {
02364     m_recentFileActions = new QAction*[m_maxRecentFiles];
02365     for ( int i = 0; i < m_maxRecentFiles; ++i )
02366     {
02367         m_recentFileActions[i] = new QAction( this );
02368         m_recentFileActions[i]->setVisible( false );
02369         connect( m_recentFileActions[i], SIGNAL( triggered() ),
02370                                            this, SLOT( OpenRecentFile() ) );
02371     }
02372 }

02374 void MainWindow::SetupActionsInsertMaterial()
02375 {
02376         QVector< TMaterialFactory* > materialsFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetMaterialFactories();
02377         if( !( materialsFactoryList.size() > 0 ) )      return;
02378 
02379         QMenu* pMaterialsMenu = menuInsert->findChild< QMenu* >( "menuMaterial" );
02380         if( !pMaterialsMenu ) return;
02381         if( pMaterialsMenu->isEmpty() )
02382         {
02383                 //Enable material menu
02384                 pMaterialsMenu->setEnabled( true );
02385                 m_materialsToolBar = CreateMaterialsTooBar( pMaterialsMenu );
02386         }
02387 
02388         for( int i = 0; i < materialsFactoryList.size(); ++i )
02389         {
02390                 TMaterialFactory* pTMaterialFactory = materialsFactoryList[i];
02391 
02392                 ActionInsertMaterial* actionInsertMaterial = new ActionInsertMaterial( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName(), this, pTMaterialFactory );
02393             actionInsertMaterial->setIcon( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialIcon() );
02394 
02395             pMaterialsMenu->addAction( actionInsertMaterial );
02396                 m_materialsToolBar->addAction( actionInsertMaterial );
02397                 m_materialsToolBar->addSeparator();
02398             connect( actionInsertMaterial, SIGNAL( triggered() ),
02399                          actionInsertMaterial, SLOT( OnActionInsertMaterialTriggered() ) );
02400                 connect( actionInsertMaterial, SIGNAL( CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* ) ),
02401                                                  this, SLOT( CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* ) ) );
02402 
02403         }
02404 
02405 }

02586 
02590 void MainWindow::SetupGraphicView()
02591 {
02592         //SetupGraphcisRoot();
02593 
02594         QSplitter* pSplitter = findChild<QSplitter *>( "horizontalSplitter" );
02595 
02596         QSplitter* graphicHorizontalSplitter = new QSplitter();
02597         graphicHorizontalSplitter->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8("graphicHorizontalSplitter") );
02598     graphicHorizontalSplitter->setOrientation( Qt::Vertical );
02599     pSplitter->insertWidget( 0, graphicHorizontalSplitter );
02600 
02601         QList<int> sizes;
02602     sizes<<500<<200;
02603     pSplitter->setSizes ( sizes );
02604 
02605 
02606     QSplitter *graphicVerticalSplitter1 = new QSplitter();
02607     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" ) );
02608     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setOrientation( Qt::Horizontal );
02609     graphicHorizontalSplitter->insertWidget( 0, graphicVerticalSplitter1 );
02610 
02611     QSplitter *graphicVerticalSplitter2 = new QSplitter();
02612     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicVerticalSplitter2"));
02613     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setOrientation(Qt::Horizontal);
02614     graphicHorizontalSplitter->insertWidget( 1, graphicVerticalSplitter2 );
02615 
02616     QList<int> height;
02617     height<<200<<200;
02618     graphicHorizontalSplitter->setSizes ( height );
02619 
02620     GraphicView* graphicView1 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter1);
02621     graphicView1->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView1"));
02622     m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView1);
02623     GraphicView* graphicView2 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter1);
02624     graphicView2->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView2"));
02625         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView2);
02626     GraphicView* graphicView3 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter2);
02627     graphicView3->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView3"));
02628         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView3);
02629     GraphicView* graphicView4 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter2);
02630     graphicView4->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView4"));
02631         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView4);
02632 
02633     graphicVerticalSplitter1->addWidget(m_graphicView[0]);
02634     graphicVerticalSplitter1->addWidget(m_graphicView[1]);
02635     graphicVerticalSplitter2->addWidget(m_graphicView[2]);
02636     graphicVerticalSplitter2->addWidget(m_graphicView[3]);
02637 
02638     QList<int> widthSizes;
02639     widthSizes<<100<<100;
02640     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setSizes ( widthSizes );
02641     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setSizes ( widthSizes );
02642 
02643     if( graphicVerticalSplitter1 && graphicVerticalSplitter2 )
02644         {
02645                 m_graphicView[0] = graphicVerticalSplitter1->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView1" );
02646         if ( m_graphicView[0] != NULL )
02647         {
02648             m_graphicView[0]->resize( 600, 400 );
02649             m_graphicView[0]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02650             m_graphicView[0]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02651             m_graphicView[0]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02652         }
02653                 else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[0] not found" );
02654 
02655                 if ( m_graphicView[1] != NULL )
02656         {
02657             m_graphicView[1]->resize( 600, 400 );
02658             m_graphicView[1]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02659             m_graphicView[1]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02660             m_graphicView[1]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02661             m_focusView=1;
02662             on_action_X_Y_Plane_triggered();
02663         }
02664         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[1] not found" );
02665 
02666                 m_graphicView[2] = graphicVerticalSplitter2->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView3" );
02667         if ( m_graphicView[2] != NULL )
02668         {
02669             m_graphicView[2]->resize( 600, 400 );
02670             m_graphicView[2]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02671             m_graphicView[2]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02672             m_graphicView[2]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02673             m_focusView=2;
02674             on_action_Y_Z_Plane_triggered();
02675         }
02676         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[2] not found" );
02677 
02678         m_graphicView[3] = graphicVerticalSplitter2->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView4" );
02679         if ( m_graphicView[3] !=  NULL )
02680         {
02681             m_graphicView[3]->resize( 600, 400 );
02682             m_graphicView[3]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02683             m_graphicView[3]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02684             m_graphicView[3]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02685             m_focusView=3;
02686             on_action_X_Z_Plane_triggered();
02687         }
02688             else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[3] not found" );
02689     }
02690         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: verticalSplitter not found" );
02691 
02692         m_graphicView[1]->hide();
02693         m_graphicView[2]->hide();
02694         m_graphicView[3]->hide();
02695         m_focusView = 0;
02696 }

02840 void MainWindow::ShowRaysIn3DView()
02841 {
02842         actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( false );
02843         actionDisplayRays->setChecked( false );
02844 
02845 
02846         if( m_fraction > 0.0 || m_drawPhotons )
02847         {
02848                 SoSeparator* rays = new SoSeparator;
02849                 rays->ref();
02850                 rays->setName( "Rays" );
02851 
02852                 if( m_drawPhotons )
02853                 {
02854                         SoSeparator* points = trf::DrawPhotonMapPoints(*m_photonMap);
02855                         rays->addChild(points);
02856                 }
02857                 if( m_fraction > 0.0 )
02858                 {
02859                         SoSeparator* currentRays = trf::DrawPhotonMapRays(*m_photonMap, m_tracedRays, m_fraction );
02860                         if( currentRays )       rays->addChild(currentRays);
02861 
02862                 }
02863                 m_graphicsRoot->AddRays( rays );
02864 
02865                 actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( true );
02866                 actionDisplayRays->setChecked( true );
02867         }
02868 }

02874 bool MainWindow::StartOver( const QString& fileName )
02875 {
02876         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
02877         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = sceneInstance->children[ sceneInstance->children.size() -1 ];
02878         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
02879 
02880         actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( false );
02881         actionDisplayRays->setChecked( false );
02882 
02883         m_graphicsRoot->RemoveRays();
02884         m_graphicsRoot->RemoveModel();
02885 
02886         m_commandStack->clear();
02887         m_sceneModel->Clear();
02888 
02889         SetSunPositionCalculatorEnabled( 0 );
02890 
02891         QStatusBar* statusbar = new QStatusBar;
02892         setStatusBar( statusbar );
02893 
02894         if( !fileName.isEmpty() && m_document->ReadFile( fileName ) )
02895         {
02896                 statusbar->showMessage( tr( "File loaded" ), 2000 );
02897             SetCurrentFile( fileName );
02898         }
02899         else
02900         {
02901                 m_document->New();
02902             statusbar->showMessage( tr( "New file" ), 2000 );
02903 
02904             SetCurrentFile( "" );
02905         }
02906 
02907     ChangeModelScene();
02908 
02909 
02910    /*if( fileName.isEmpty() )
02911     {
02912         m_document->New();
02913         statusbar->showMessage( tr( "New file" ), 2000 );
02914     }
02915     else
02916     {
02917         if( !m_document->ReadFile( fileName ) )
02918                 {
02919                         statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "Loading canceled" ), 2000 );
02920                         return false;
02921                 }
02922        statusbar->showMessage( tr( "File loaded" ), 2000 );
02923     }
02924 
02925     SetCurrentFile( fileName );
02926 
02927     ChangeModelScene();*/
02928 
02929         m_sceneModel->DisplayAnalyzeResults();
02930 
02931     return true;
02932 }

02937 QString MainWindow::StrippedName( const QString& fullFileName )
02938 {
02939         return QFileInfo( fullFileName ).fileName();
02940 }
02941 
02945 void MainWindow::UpdateRecentFileActions()
02946 {
02947         QMutableStringListIterator iterator( m_recentFiles );
02948         while ( iterator.hasNext() )
02949         {
02950                 if ( !QFile::exists( iterator.next() ) ) iterator.remove();
02951         }
02952 
02953         for ( int j = 0; j < m_maxRecentFiles; ++j )
02954         {
02955                 if ( j < m_recentFiles.count() )
02956                 {
02957                         QString text = tr( "&%1 %2" )
02958                                        .arg( j + 1 )
02959                                        .arg( StrippedName( m_recentFiles[j] ) );
02960                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setText( text );
02961                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setData( m_recentFiles[j] );
02962                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setVisible( true );
02963                 }
02964                 else m_recentFileActions[j]->setVisible( false );
02965         }
02966 }
02967 
02971 void MainWindow::WriteSettings()
02972 {
02973         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
02974         settings.setValue( "geometry", geometry() );
02975 
02976         Qt::WindowStates states = windowState();
02977         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowNoState ) )      settings.setValue( "windowNoState", true );
02978         else    settings.setValue( "windowNoState", false );
02979         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowMinimized ) )    settings.setValue( "windowMinimized", true );
02980         else    settings.setValue( "windowMinimized", false );
02981         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowMaximized ) )    settings.setValue( "windowMaximized", true );
02982         else    settings.setValue( "windowMaximized", false );
02983         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowFullScreen ) )   settings.setValue( "windowFullScreen", true );
02984         else    settings.setValue( "windowFullScreen", false );
02985         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowActive ) )       settings.setValue( "windowActive", true );
02986         else    settings.setValue( "windowActive", false );
02987 
02988     settings.setValue( "recentFiles", m_recentFiles );
02989 }
